page.title: 16SOME KINDS OF MAMMALS
page.content: Some kinds of small mammals make good pets.Rats mice gerbils and hamsters are best kept indoors or at least in an out building.The first golden hamster to reach Britain were brought here in 1931.You can get all different breds of hamster.New breds are being bred some hamsters now have pale cream fur.The body of a hamster is short and sturdy and a broad head with a blunt nose and a set of fine whiskers.If you are hoping for your hamster to grow tame you should never frighten him.Dont poke your fingers into the cage because hamsters are short sighted and they will think your finger is food and they bite.Do not pick your hamster up when he is sleepy or make loud noises by his cage.
